WHAT YOU CAN DO
- Modes: Play this fun filled third-person shooter (TPS) game and explore modes such as Run, and Shoot. This game is packed with adventure, action, and cherished moments, make sure to live all of it!

- Explore World: Travel to exciting new places and discover hidden surprises. Move into different landscapes of Escape City, Ruins, and Town Market, everything in one package of ESCAPE RUN AND SHOOT!

- Earn Coins: Achieve highest scores and showcase with your friends.

- Keep Playing: You can dive into the endless fun filled run and gun.

DOWNLOAD FOR FREE
HD quality gaming on your mobile or tablet with easy and intuitive controls, and thrilling 3D graphics and sounds. Experience the thrill of the world’s best run and shooter game on your phone exclusively on Meta.

UPDATES COMING,
ESCAPE, RUN, AND SHOOT releases new content every month with new characters, modes, maps, themes, events, leaderboard, achievement, in-app purchases and rewards. Hop in and take on the enemies now!

FEEDBACK
Developer welcomes any feedback during your experience to improve the game. To give feedback, email the developer on developer’s site under APP SUPPORT section.

Note: An internet connection maybe required to play this game.

© 2024 Subrit Dikshit. By downloading, installing or using this App, you agree to privacy policy and terms of use, as may be updated by Subrit from time to time. Please visit https://sites.google.com/view/escaperunandshoot/app-privacy-policy to view policy and terms of use.
